name: heimdall
description: Heimdall is a self hosted application dashboard for organizing links to your services. It automatically detects many apps to show status and logos, making a clean, centralized homepage for homelab or server environments.
features: Application Dashboard: Centralized homepage for organizing links to all your self-hosted services.
Auto-Detection: Automatically detect and configure popular applications with correct logos and colors.
Status Monitoring: Display service status and availability directly on dashboard tiles.
Custom Icons: Use built-in icon library or upload custom logos for your applications.
Search Functionality: Quickly find and access services with integrated search.
Multi-User Support: Create separate dashboards for different users with individual preferences.
Responsive Design: Works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Easy Configuration: Add and organize services through a simple web interface.
